name: Super Crazy Chickens
description:
Super Crazy Chickens is a 2D platform game with moderate difficulty.
Here is a bit of his story:
This region is full of stories to tell, the best one is about a group of chickens in charge of defending it from any threat that occurs. In front of their eyes they find their greatest challenge. Mysterious green eggs have appeared all over the area and now there is a group tasked with finding them for an unknown use. Your mission will be to get those green eggs before they do, to do this use all your possible tools, while you add more people to your team. You can also practice on the levels made by people... online!
